entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of rain or snow mixed with drizzle beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
